title: Seven women, including Elsa Harris, wife of Charles "Teenie" Harris, wearing dark dress with sequined bow on left, Julia Gaines wearing pinstriped suit with brooch, and two men, including George W. Gaines wearing dark jacket with light colored trim and collar, posed around table with dishware, in the Gaines' home with record player, family photographs including one of George W. Gaines, and document on wall reading "To a friends's house the road is never long"
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
